I am a PhD Candidate at ICS UCI. My research area is Embedded Systems. My research focus is on Cyber-Physical Systems and Multi-Processor SoC Architectures.

Work

Position : Graduate Student Researcher at CECS
Place     : Embedded Software Lab

Education

  • PhD in Computer Science (2014 expected) at University of California, Irvine
  • M.S in Computer Science (2010) at University of California, Irvine
  • B.S in Electronics (2006) at Gazi University, Ankara

Research Interests

  • Multi-Processor SoC Architectures (MPSoC)
  • Cyber-Physical Systems (CPS)
  • Internet of Things (IoT)
